Reviews.Title: just for calling but lacking some basic features
Reviews.Author: cosmic
Reviews.Content: It has a lot of features for the price which is nice, but mine would not let me enter names and numbers into the phonebook for quick dialing which is a basic feature; maybe I got a defective one.And I don't think it would allow some setting changes since I changed it to ring only without vibrate, but it continues to do both, which isn't a huge deal. Also not easy to get to volume control; not sure how to change the volume when in the middle of a call, but can switch to speaker mode which helps. So some basic features are lacking. But on the good side it accepted my sim card right away and battery life appears good.

Reviews.Title: No T9 or other predictive text
Reviews.Author: Amodernway
Reviews.Content: Phone actually pairs with BT devices fine, but the text app has no prediction or T9 input, beware.And the battery really does last forever

Reviews.Title: It worked wherever we went!
Reviews.Author: David Dohi
Reviews.Content: We used the Onesimcard international phone SIM card, and this phone performed perfectly.  No dropped calls, good voice and sound, reliable all throughout Europe.  Cheap, and much more sophisticated than the original candy bar phones, too!  A Godsend where VoIP internet was unreliable (and there were MANY places where it was!)  We will use this again and again for our foreign travels.

Reviews.Title: BLU Tank T190i: Terrific, basic phone with very long battery life and good call quality
Reviews.Author: Margo MacFarland
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a basic, international phone for my family to use on an upcoming trip overseas.Meantime, we've been using it in the U.S and it's been great.Battery life is unbelievably long and call quality is clear, with good volume (we use it on T-mobile). Also, it has a radio that plays on speaker, and a flashlight. Both have been very useful.

Reviews.Title: Great battery
Reviews.Author: Crispin Passee
Reviews.Content: The battery on this phone is great, the charge lasted for about for about 11 days. Its great for someone who travels a lot and needs a phone with basis features.

Reviews.Title: This Phone is awesome ...
Reviews.Author: AMIT BHALLA
Reviews.Content: Battery is very very Powerful ..Voice Quality is Excellent.......very handy.....easily comes into pocket...I am totally satisifed with the Phone.. just loved it

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Fu Sun
Reviews.Content: One of the best phone for its value. Arrived on time, the phone has a camera, FM radio, text message, big button, good for older people to see and use. I bought this for my wife, she liked. The best for its price. Just hope the screen can be a little larger.

Reviews.Title: loved it
Reviews.Author: yamesha campbell
Reviews.Content: bought the phone for my aunt to use in another country with a sim card she said everything worked perfectly so overall everything was great

Reviews.Title: great phone for the price.
Reviews.Author: ever vera
Reviews.Content: for this cheap price this is a great phone has more of what you would expect in a phone this price.

Reviews.Title: works international
Reviews.Author: J. Perry "Mother"
Reviews.Content: Excellent price. This product is lightweight, simple and works internationally. Just insert the sim card from your choice of country and its ready to make phone calls. Long battery life, charged half way when purchased.

Reviews.Title: Dual SIM phone
Reviews.Author: Phyllis Curley
Reviews.Content: I haven't used it yet because I got it for use in Mexico and Italy.  However, when I put in the respective SIM cards from my old phones, it readily produced my phone book/contacts for each country.  I'll know more about it when I use it in Italy in October and in Mexico in December.  But, so far so good.

Reviews.Title: Did not work in italy
Reviews.Author: Not4me
Reviews.Content: Bought this phone for use in Europe. I swapped out the sim cards on arrival and it did NOT work. I bought another cheap phone while in Italy and that one DID work. Other reviewers said they had luck with this phone, I did not.

Reviews.Title: Good Basic Phone
Reviews.Author: Mel
Reviews.Content: Purchased as a backup phone only, I do not mind the extremely basic function set, it does the job well. Standby battery life is about 2 weeks.

Reviews.Title: ok phone
Reviews.Author: Cristina Montelongo
Reviews.Content: its basic and will work for phone calls and bettery is good so for price and basic need its ok.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: Shany1
Reviews.Content: I love this phone...it gave two sim card sl ot...very beautiful...long lastin battery...i would recomend for some who want some

Reviews.Title: This was a great phone and met my needs in Costa Rica.
Reviews.Author: Bronwyn  Schielke
Reviews.Content: This telephone arrived within 2 days of when I ordered it.  It had an instruction booklet and everything I needed to have it activated with a chip in Costa Rica.  It worked great.  It stayed charged for the whole week I was in Costa Rica.  I

Reviews.Title: Great Phone For International Travel
Reviews.Author: soldmymind
Reviews.Content: I have multiple of these phones for working with small film crews in foreign countries. As they are exclusively for working abroad, these phones actually have many more abilities than I need, but for the price I don't feel like I'm paying any more than I should for a phone that can work abroad.The second SIM card slot that allows my crew members to plug in their own personal SIM as well is a great perk.I, and crew members, have had a few problems with the phones seeming to get stuck in silent mode - eventually after a bit of button mashing we always seem to figure it out.

Reviews.Title: As expected
Reviews.Author: Cristina
Reviews.Content: This is a very basic cell phone, but if that is what you need, this one works perfectly fine. It works in the 900 which is what is needed for countries like Cuba, where anyway there is not much else you can do with the cellphone without paying a crazy amount of money.

Reviews.Title: T-Mobile USA employee
Reviews.Author: Seth Forbus "PS3 FANBOY"
Reviews.Content: Bought this phone for my little sister. (She is 12). The battery life estimate is correct! Works forever it seems. Works on T-Mobile USA perfectly over 2G. SMS and calls work great and the quality was better than I expected for the price. Made a great birthday present for a girl who wanted a durable phone without much responsibility. I'm pleased!

Reviews.Title: Phone looks ok on amazon but it did not work after one week.
Reviews.Author: G.W. "gw"
Reviews.Content: it did not work after one week. return and got refund, would not recommend to anyone. phone is very light and does not feel like a cell phone,

Reviews.Title: DON'T SPEND your $$
Reviews.Author: RONI
Reviews.Content: The phone doesn't work as it should,you can't hear without putting call on speaker (SO FORGET ABOUT PRIVACY) it's a very low quality product :(

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: Rubén Astudillo.
Reviews.Content: a good response to my request, I am pleased to acquire products that easy to go straight to my home or office without so many complications ...

Reviews.Title: buy something else
Reviews.Author: C. McRae "Cocoalicious"
Reviews.Content: u cant add or save new numbers. the volume is always going low and the signal is only strong when it wants to be.

Reviews.Title: Nice and simple phone
Reviews.Author: C.H.
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my mother who wanted a simple phone with large keys. Easy to navigate, has loud ring and large icon display. Adding contact names was a bit of a challenge as well as using cap letters.

Reviews.Title: simple and good
Reviews.Author: Chao Chu
Reviews.Content: u cannot expect too much for this cheap mobile, but it's enough for me except that it cannot support Chinese. I ignored this feature before, so not convenient to me somehow.

Reviews.Author: lala
Reviews.Content: ;-) Perfect it's just what I need for the phone plan I got for my step daughter. She loves it.

Reviews.Title: BEWARE -- do not buy this product!  Disgraceful packaging from Amazon
Reviews.Author: Dr. S "Dr. S"
Reviews.Content: Package arrived open with no tape of any kind on it, and one end of the package was completely open!  The seal on the item itself was broken; consequently I did not open the item and returned it immediately.  There was no packing material in the open package and no order slip of any kind.  Makes one wonder who went into this box, why, and at what point.  I should have paid attention to the other reviews that stated this happened to them.  Purchase this item at your own peril.

Reviews.Title: very good product
Reviews.Author: Alexis Lira
Reviews.Content: Well my mother in law is very happy for this phone is very easy to use strong in case of she leaves it to fall and for her eyes the number and letter are very big and she can see easily

Reviews.Title: Bad packaging & did not work at all
Reviews.Author: kw44
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately , and surprisingly, the packaging that came from Amazon fulfillment center in KY, was terrible! The package was not even sealed.  The box that the phone came in was already opened as the sealed was broken!  It clearly marked "Do not accept if seal is broken" on the box. Hence, there was the 2nd sign of "beware" what's in it?My husband thought, well, lets give it a try by setting up the phone exactly per the instructions & charging it for 24 hours as per the instruction.Well, 30 hours later, it is still indicating the charging blink. Wen we unplug the phone, nothing works, the phone is still off and battery is dead.I am returning the item and am very disappointed with Amazon's packaging and and did even seem to care about the condition of the product that they are shipping from their fulfillment centers. You would think that they would not ship the item if the packaging is clearly damaged or already opened. It was a total waste of $$$ that I even paid for next day shipping!

Reviews.Title: My new Blu tank
Reviews.Author: Zaida
Reviews.Content: This phone  is very light and I really like the colors pink and white, and Blue and White. Also because it has for two lines, very good for business. It also has for micro sd. I love it.

Reviews.Title: good basic phone
Reviews.Author: Ty
Reviews.Content: Very basic.  good for non long term phone, fm radio works great. good first phone, cute; looks like a toy

Reviews.Title: NOT HAPPY
Reviews.Author: PETTER
Reviews.Content: JUST A VERY BAD QUALITY I WANT MY MONEY BACK AND I GOT THE PRODUCT LATEIT LOOKS GOOD ON THE PICTURES BUT IT IS TOO SMALL AND BAD PRODUCT TO USE

Reviews.Title: convenient for travelling
Reviews.Author: RC "Ruth"
Reviews.Content: I have another more fashionable cell phone, but I like this phone better because it is smaller, lighter, and easier to dial a number.  I think it is more suitable for old people.  The dual sim and quad-band functions allow me to add an internatinal sim card when I go overseas.  If the camera should have higher quality, I would like it even more.

Reviews.Title: best small TANK
Reviews.Author: Amazonuser
Reviews.Content: best basic phone, 3 phone  in $90= 1tank+2jenny,  when phone arrived its battery was on Jenny blu phone box, and jenny battery in Tank phone box. be careful,they dont have same battery. Tank battery r bigger then jenny.

Reviews.Title: No sim card with it? I can't get the customer care number to answer?
Reviews.Author: R. Darrington "amunra"
Reviews.Content: I don't know what to think....except the seal wasn't broken but there are no sim cards! would someone let me know?I wrote email and phoned..no response.

ProductInfo.Features:
GSM Quad band, Unlocked Dual Sim 850/900/1800/1900
30 Days Standby-By Battery, 16 Hour Talk Time
1.8" LCD Display, Camera, Bluetooth, Facebook, Twitter
Built-in FM Antenna, MP3 Player, MP4 Player
ProductInfo.Name: BLU Tank T190i Unlocked GSM Quad-Band Phone with Dual SIM, VGA Camera, FM Radio, MP3 Player, Flashlight and microSD Slot - White/Pink
